Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with busts of Demeter, Sarapis and Isis above an altar. The shoulder is plain except for three small studs near the nozzle and a stud on each side of the handle. At the rear is a ring handle, the spine of which forks at the bottom. The slightly raised base is defined by a groove; within is the Greek inscription "Milesos" with a palm-branch below. Covered with a patchy red-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2045.bis)
